proposal: Hey 404 Tools community! 🐾 Noticed you're paving the way in the 404 ecosystem with innovative tools for the Furry Minds. With 146 holders on the ETH network, that's quite the pack! 🐕 If you're looking to expand your toolkit, our DEX, Lottery, and other B2B tools could be the perfect addition. Let's make the 404 ecosystem even more resourceful together. How about we create something that even a cat would be curious about? 🐱🔧
